text: Granville is a city in Iowa in the United States. The population was 310 at the 2020 census. ==History== Granville was first found on the map in 1882. It was named after Richard Grenville. He is an English explorer. A post office called Granville began service from 1884 onwards. ==Geography== Granville is located at (42.984552, -95.875737). The city has a total area of . This is based on the United States Census Bureau. All of the area is land. ==Demographics== ==References== Category:Cities in Iowa
title: Granville, Iowa
